constantValues: Contract involving the sale of one or more vehicle or device to a customer.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: contractDate

constantValues: The origination date of the sales contract.

members.description: The origination date of the sales contract.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: dealId

constantValues: The parent deal associated with this sales contract.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The parent deal associated with this sales contract.

members.name: description
members.description: Description of the sales contact.

members.name: endDate

constantValues: The date at which the sales contract will end.

members.description: The date at which the sales contract will end.

members.name: finalBalloonPayment

constantValues: The amount of the final payment due at maturity of the sales contract.

members.description: The amount of the final payment due at maturity of the sales contract.

members.name: finalBalloonPaymentBase

constantValues: Value of the final balloon payment in base currency.

members.description: Value of the final balloon payment in base currency.

members.name: name

constantValues: Name of the sales contract detail.

members.description: Name of the sales contract detail.

members.name: originationCommission

constantValues: The commission amount paid for origination of the loan.

members.description: The commission amount paid for origination of the loan.

members.name: originationCommissionBase

constantValues: Value of the origination commission in base currency.

members.description: Value of the origination commission in base currency.

members.name: salesContractId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

foreignKeyAttribute.name: salesContractTypeId

constantValues: Category of the sales contract (cash, finance, or lease).

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Category of the sales contract (cash, finance, or lease).

members.name: sellingPrice

constantValues: The price for which the vehicle or device is sold.

members.description: The price for which the vehicle or device is sold.

members.name: sellingPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the Selling Price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Selling Price in base currency.

members.name: startDate

constantValues: The day at which the sales contract takes effect.

members.description: The day at which the sales contract takes effect.

members.name: totalAdd

constantValues: The price charged for all add-ons included in this sales contract.

members.description: The price charged for all add-ons included in this sales contract.

members.name: totalAddBase

constantValues: Value of the total add-ons price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total add-ons price in base currency.

members.name: totalAddOnsCost

constantValues: The cost for all add-ons included in this sales contract.

members.description: The cost for all add-ons included in this sales contract.

members.name: totalAddOnsCostBase

constantValues: Value of the total add-ons cost in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total add-ons cost in base currency.

members.name: totalDownpayment

constantValues: The down payment being applied at origination of the loan.

members.description: The down payment being applied at origination of the loan.

members.name: totalDownpaymentBase

constantValues: Value of the total down payment in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total down payment in base currency.

members.name: totalMonthlyPayment

constantValues: The amount to be paid each month for the life of the loan.

members.description: The amount to be paid each month for the life of the loan.

members.name: totalMonthlyPaymentBase

constantValues: Value of the total monthly payment in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total monthly payment in base currency.

members.name: totalServiceContractCost

constantValues: The total cost of the service contract associated with this sale.

members.description: The total cost of the service contract associated with this sale.

members.name: totalServiceContractCostBase

constantValues: Value of the total service contract cost in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total service contract cost in base currency.

members.name: totalServiceContractsPrice

constantValues: The price changed for the service contract associated with this sale.

members.description: The price changed for the service contract associated with this sale.

members.name: totalServiceContractsPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the total service contracts price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total service contracts price in base currency.

members.name: totalTaxesAndFees

constantValues: Total of all taxes and fees applied to this sales contract.

members.description: Total of all taxes and fees applied to this sales contract.

members.name: totalTaxesAndFeesBase

constantValues: Value of the total taxes and fees in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total taxes and fees in base currency.

members.name: totalTradeIn

constantValues: The value set for the trade in included in this sales contract.

members.description: The value set for the trade in included in this sales contract.

members.name: totalTradeInBase

constantValues: Value of the total trade in in base currency.

members.description: Value of the total trade in in base currency.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.description: Status of the Sales Contract

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'SalesContract' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Sales Contract

addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
